org.ingatan.component.quiztime
Class TableQuestionUnit

java.lang.Object
  org.ingatan.component.quiztime.TableQuestionUnit
All Implemented Interfaces:
IQuestion
public class TableQuestionUnit
extends java.lang.Object
implements IQuestion

This class is used to represent a single entry in a TableQuestion. The class also keeps a reference to the original table question, so that it has access to whether or no it is appropriate to ask the question in reverse, as well as the question templates.

This class is used by the quiz manager to handle table questions so that they can be broken up by correctness.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Thomas Everingham

getQuestionColumnData

public java.lang.String[] getQuestionColumnData()
Gets the answer column data. Each entry in the array is a possible question, or possible answer, depending on which way the question is being asked. This array does not represent an entire column of data from the TableQuestion but the possible answers/questions entered in a single cell of the TableQuestion.

Returns:
the answer column data for this question.

getAnswerColumnData

public java.lang.String[] getAnswerColumnData()
Gets the answer column data. Each entry in the array is a possible question, or possible answer, depending on which way the question is being asked. This array does not represent an entire column of data from the TableQuestion but the possible answers/questions entered in a single cell of the TableQuestion.

Returns:
the answer column data for this question.
